TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit IPAddress extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 Internet 协议 (IP) 地址。

span.span: Provides an Internet Protocol (IP) address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含 IP 网络上计算机的地址。The class contains the address of a computer on an IP network. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何查询服务器，若要获取的家庭地址和 IP 地址它支持。The following code example shows how to query a server to obtain the family addresses and the IP addresses it supports. [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/CPP/ipaddress.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/CS/ipaddress.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/VB/ipaddress.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定为 数组的地址初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the address specified as a array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用创建属性设置为`address`。The is created with the property set to `address`. 如果的长度`address`为 4，构造 IPv4 地址; 否则，构造包含的范围为 0 的 IPv6 地址。If the length of `address` is 4, constructs an IPv4 address; otherwise, an IPv6 address with a scope of 0 is constructed. 数组被假定为与索引位置 0 中的第最高有效字节以网络字节顺序。The array is assumed to be in network byte order with the most significant byte first in index position 0.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 包含错误的 IP 地址。

span.span: contains a bad IP address.

span.span: For example, the value 0x2414188f in big-endian format would be the IP address "143.24.20.36".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的 IP 地址的哈希代码。The method returns a hash code of the IP address. 此值可以用作哈希表中的键。This value can be used as a key in hash tables.

summary.span: 将值由主机字节顺序转换为网络字节顺序。

span.span: Converts a value from host byte order to network byte order.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int16 HostToNetworkOrder(int16 host) cil managed
Public Shared Function HostToNetworkOrder (host As Short) As Short

param.name: host
param.span: 以主机字节顺序表示的要转换的数字。

span.span: The number to convert, expressed in host byte order.

summary.span: 将短值由主机字节顺序转换为网络字节顺序。

span.span: Converts a short value from host byte order to network byte order.

returns.span: 以网络字节顺序表示的短值。

span.span: A short value, expressed in network byte order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同的计算机进行排序的字节多字节的整数值中使用不同的约定。Different computers use different conventions for ordering the bytes within multibyte integer values. 首先放置最高有效字节某些计算机 （称为 big endian 顺序） 和其他人首先放置的最低有效字节 （统称为 little-endian 顺序）。Some computers put the most significant byte first (known as big-endian order) and others put the least-significant byte first (known as little-endian order). 若要使用不同的字节顺序的计算机使用，以网络字节顺序首先具有最高有效字节发送通过网络发送的所有整数值。To work with computers that use different byte ordering, all integer values that are sent over the network are sent in network byte order which has the most significant byte first. 方法将转换为使用的网络字节顺序主机所使用的字节顺序从主机系统存储的多字节的整数值。The method converts multibyte integer values that are stored on the host system from the byte order used by the host to the byte order used by the network.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32 HostToNetworkOrder(int32 host) cil managed
Public Shared Function HostToNetworkOrder (host As Integer) As Integer

param.name: host
param.span: 以主机字节顺序表示的要转换的数字。

span.span: The number to convert, expressed in host byte order.

summary.span: 将整数值由主机字节顺序转换为网络字节顺序。

span.span: Converts an integer value from host byte order to network byte order.

returns.span: 以网络字节顺序表示的整数值。

span.span: An integer value, expressed in network byte order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同的计算机进行排序的字节多字节的整数值中使用不同的约定。Different computers use different conventions for ordering the bytes within multibyte integer values. 首先放置最高有效字节某些计算机 （称为 big endian 顺序） 和其他人首先放置的最低有效字节 （统称为 little-endian 顺序）。Some computers put the most significant byte first (known as big-endian order) and others put the least-significant byte first (known as little-endian order). 若要使用不同的字节顺序的计算机使用，以网络字节顺序首先具有最高有效字节发送通过网络发送的所有整数值。To work with computers that use different byte ordering, all integer values that are sent over the network are sent in network byte order which has the most significant byte first. 方法将转换为使用的网络字节顺序主机所使用的字节顺序从主机系统存储的多字节的整数值。The method converts multibyte integer values that are stored on the host system from the byte order used by the host to the byte order used by the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同的计算机进行排序的字节多字节的整数值中使用不同的约定。Different computers use different conventions for ordering the bytes within multibyte integer values. 首先放置最高有效字节某些计算机 （称为 big endian 顺序） 和其他人首先放置的最低有效字节 （统称为 little-endian 顺序）。Some computers put the most significant byte first (known as big-endian order) and others put the least-significant byte first (known as little-endian order). 若要使用不同的字节顺序的计算机使用，以网络字节顺序首先具有最高有效字节发送通过网络发送的所有整数值。To work with computers that use different byte ordering, all integer values that are sent over the network are sent in network byte order which has the most significant byte first. 方法将转换为使用的网络字节顺序主机所使用的字节顺序从主机系统存储的多字节的整数值。The method converts multibyte integer values that are stored on the host system from the byte order used by the host to the byte order used by the network.

summary.span: 方法使用 字段指示 必须侦听所有网络接口上的客户端活动。

span.span: The method uses the field to indicate that a must listen for client activity on all network interfaces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段等效于 0:0:0:0:0:0:0:0 以冒号十六进制表示法或:: 中的简洁表示法。The field is equivalent to 0:0:0:0:0:0:0:0 in colon-hexadecimal notation, or to :: in compact notation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例采用标准的压缩格式显示的当前值主机的任何地址。The following code example displays the value of the current host's Any address in standard compressed format. [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback/CPP/noneanyloopback.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback/CS/noneanyloopback.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback/VB/noneanyloopback.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsIPv4MappedToIPv6 As Boolean
public: property bool IsIPv4MappedToIPv6 { bool get(); };

summary.span: 了解 IP 地址是否为 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址。

span.span: Gets whether the IP address is an IPv4-mapped IPv6 address.
Returns .

value.span: 如果 IP 地址为 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the IP address is an IPv4-mapped IPv6 address; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 双协议栈套接字始终需要 IPv6 地址。Dual-stack sockets always require IPv6 addresses. 能够使用 IPv4 地址进行交互需要使用 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式。The ability to interact with an IPv4 address requires the use of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format. 任何 IPv4 地址，必须以启用 IPv6 唯一应用程序与 IPv4 节点进行通信的 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式表示。Any IPv4 addresses must be represented in the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format which enables an IPv6 only application to communicate with an IPv4 node. IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式允许一个 IPv4 节点而无法表示为 IPv6 地址的 IPv4 地址。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format allows the IPv4 address of an IPv4 node to be represented as an IPv6 address. IPv4 地址被编码为 IPv6 地址的低阶 32 位和高序位 96 位保留固定的前缀 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF。The IPv4 address is encoded into the low-order 32 bits of the IPv6 address, and the high-order 96 bits hold the fixed prefix 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF. RFC 4291 中指定的 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format is specified in RFC 4291. 有关详细信息，请参阅[www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231)。For more information, see [www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231).

span.span: if the IP address is an IPv6 Teredo address; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Teredo 地址为 IPv6 地址前缀为 2001年:: / 32。A Teredo address is an IPv6 address with the prefix of 2001::/32. Teredo 地址可以是返回通过正常的 DNS 名称解析或枚举为分配给本地接口的 IPv6 地址。Teredo addresses can be returned through normal DNS name resolution or enumerated as an IPv6 address assigned to a local interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法比较`address`到，并返回`true`如果两个 IP 地址相同。The method compares `address` to and returns `true` if the two IP addresses are the same. 对于 IPv4，该方法将返回`true`窗体的任何 IP 地址 127.X.Y.Z （其中 X、 Y 和 Z 为 0-255 范围内），而不仅仅是(127.0.0.1)。In the case of IPv4, that the method returns `true` for any IP address of the form 127.X.Y.Z (where X, Y, and Z are in the range 0-255), not just (127.0.0.1). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以确定指定的地址是否为环回地址。The following code example uses the method to determine whether the specified address is a loopback address. [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback/CPP/isloopback.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback/CS/isloopback.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback/VB/isloopback.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[IPAddress_Broadcast_Loopback#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_Broadcast_Loopback/CPP/ipaddress_broadcast_loopback.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IPAddress_Broadcast_Loopback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_Broadcast_Loopback/CS/ipaddress_broadcast_loopback.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IPAddress_Broadcast_Loopback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_Broadcast_Loopback/VB/ipaddress_broadcast_loopback.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.IPAddress MapToIPv4() cil managed

summary.span: 将 对象映射到 IPv4 地址。

span.span: Maps the object to an IPv4 address.
Returns .
An IPv4 address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 双协议栈套接字始终需要 IPv6 地址。Dual-stack sockets always require IPv6 addresses. 能够使用 IPv4 地址进行交互需要使用 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式。The ability to interact with an IPv4 address requires the use of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format. 任何 IPv4 地址，必须以启用 IPv6 唯一应用程序与 IPv4 节点进行通信的 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式表示。Any IPv4 addresses must be represented in the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format which enables an IPv6 only application to communicate with an IPv4 node. IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式允许一个 IPv4 节点而无法表示为 IPv6 地址的 IPv4 地址。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format allows the IPv4 address of an IPv4 node to be represented as an IPv6 address. IPv4 地址被编码为 IPv6 地址的低阶 32 位和高序位 96 位保留固定的前缀 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF。The IPv4 address is encoded into the low-order 32 bits of the IPv6 address, and the high-order 96 bits hold the fixed prefix 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF. RFC 4291 中指定的 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format is specified in RFC 4291. 有关详细信息，请参阅[www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231)。For more information, see [www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231). 如果你想要使用将 IPv4 地址从 IPv6 格式转换为 IPv4 格式，您必须首先确保已获得的 IPv4 地址。If you want to use to convert an IPv4 address from IPv6 format to IPv4 format, you must first ensure that you've got an IPv4 address. 调用，这将返回`true`如果 IP 地址最初编写为 IPv6 的 IPv4 或`false`否则为。Call , which will return `true` if the IP address is originally IPv4 written as IPv6, or `false` otherwise. 如果将返回`true`，使用进行转换。If returns `true`, use to make the conversion.

An IPv6 address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 双协议栈套接字始终需要 IPv6 地址。Dual-stack sockets always require IPv6 addresses. 能够使用 IPv4 地址进行交互需要使用 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式。The ability to interact with an IPv4 address requires the use of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format. 任何 IPv4 地址，必须以启用 IPv6 唯一应用程序与 IPv4 节点进行通信的 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式表示。Any IPv4 addresses must be represented in the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format which enables an IPv6 only application to communicate with an IPv4 node. IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式允许一个 IPv4 节点而无法表示为 IPv6 地址的 IPv4 地址。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format allows the IPv4 address of an IPv4 node to be represented as an IPv6 address. IPv4 地址被编码为 IPv6 地址的低阶 32 位和高序位 96 位保留固定的前缀 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF。The IPv4 address is encoded into the low-order 32 bits of the IPv6 address, and the high-order 96 bits hold the fixed prefix 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF. RFC 4291 中指定的 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format is specified in RFC 4291. 有关详细信息，请参阅[www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231)。For more information, see [www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231).

summary.span: 将数字由网络字节顺序转换为主机字节顺序。

span.span: Converts a number from network byte order to host byte order.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int16 NetworkToHostOrder(int16 network) cil managed
Public Shared Function NetworkToHostOrder (network As Short) As Short

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: network
param.span: 以网络字节顺序表示的要转换的数字。

span.span: The number to convert, expressed in network byte order.

summary.span: 将短值由网络字节顺序转换为主机字节顺序。

span.span: Converts a short value from network byte order to host byte order.

returns.span: 以主机字节顺序表示的短值。

span.span: A short value, expressed in host byte order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同的计算机进行排序的字节多字节的整数值中使用不同的约定。Different computers use different conventions for ordering the bytes within multibyte integer values. 首先放置最高有效字节某些计算机 （称为 big endian 顺序） 和其他人首先放置的最低有效字节 （统称为 little-endian 顺序）。Some computers put the most significant byte first (known as big-endian order) and others put the least-significant byte first (known as little-endian order). 若要使用不同的字节顺序的计算机使用，以网络字节顺序首先具有最高有效字节发送通过网络发送的所有整数值。To work with computers that use different byte ordering, all integer values that are sent over the network are sent in network byte order which has the most significant byte first. 方法将转换到主机所使用的字节顺序的网络使用的字节顺序从主机系统存储的多字节的整数值。The method converts multibyte integer values that are stored on the host system from the byte order used by the network to the byte order used by the host. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法，将较短的值由网络字节顺序转换为主机字节顺序。The following example uses the method to convert a short value from network byte order to host byte order. [!code-cpp[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/CPP/ipaddress_networktohost.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/CS/ipaddress_networktohost.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/VB/ipaddress_networktohost.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: ipString
param.span: 包含 IP 地址（IPv4 使用点分四组表示法，IPv6 使用冒号十六进制表示法）的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains an IP address in dotted-quad notation for IPv4 and in colon-hexadecimal notation for IPv6.

summary.span: 将 IP 地址字符串转换为 实例。

span.span: Converts an IP address string to an instance.
An instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 静态方法创建实例从表示在点分四部分表示法用于 IPv4 和 IPv6 使用冒号十六进制表示法中的 IP 地址。The static method creates an instance from an IP address expressed in dotted-quad notation for IPv4 and in colon-hexadecimal notation for IPv6. 中的部分数 （由句点分隔每个部分）`ipString`确定如何构造的 IP 地址。The number of parts (each part is separated by a period) in `ipString` determines how the IP address is constructed. 一个部件地址是直接存储在网络地址。A one part address is stored directly in the network address. 两个部分地址，用于指定一个类 A 地址，方便将放置在第一个字节和网络地址以最右侧的三个字节为单位的尾部部分的前导部分。A two part address, convenient for specifying a class A address, puts the leading part in the first byte and the trailing part in the right-most three bytes of the network address. 三个部分组成地址，用于指定一个 B 类地址，方便将放置在第一个字节、 第二部分中的第二个字节和网络地址的最后部分中最右边的两个字节的第一个部分。A three part address, convenient for specifying a class B address, puts the first part in the first byte, the second part in the second byte, and the final part in the right-most two bytes of the network address. 例如:For example: |部分数和示例 `ipString`Number of parts and example `ipString`|Ip 地址的 IPv4 地址IPv4 address for IPAddress| |--------------------------------------------|--------------------------------| |1 -- "65535"1 -- "65535"|0.0.255.2550.0.255.255| |2 -- "20.2"2 -- "20.2"|20.0.0.220.0.0.2| |2 -- "20.65535"2 -- "20.65535"|20.0.255.25520.0.255.255| |3 -- "128.1.2"3 -- "128.1.2"|128.1.0.2128.1.0.2| ## Examples 下面的代码将包含在点分四部分表示法用于 IPv4 或 ipv6，到的实例的冒号十六进制表示法中的 IP 地址的字符串转换类。The following code converts a string that contains an IP address, in dotted-quad notation for IPv4 or in colon-hexadecimal notation for IPv6, into an instance of the class. 然后，它使用重载方法以标准表示法中显示的地址。Then it uses the overloaded method to display the address in standard notation. [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.Parse/CPP/parse.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.Parse/CS/parse.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.Parse/VB/parse.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long ScopeId { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.ScopeId : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 IPv6 地址范围标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the IPv6 address scope identifier.

value.span: 指定地址范围的长整数。

span.span: A long integer that specifies the scope of the address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 含义具体取决于使用它的上下文的更改。The meaning of changes depending on the context in which it is used. - 链接-本地地址。Link-local address. 在主机上具有多个接口连接到不同的链接，相同的链接-本地地址可以分配给多个接口。On a host with multiple interfaces connected to separate links, the same link-local address can be assigned to multiple interfaces. 若要消除此歧义性，范围标识符用于指定交换消息的接口。To eliminate this ambiguity, a scope identifier is used to specify the interface over which messages are exchanged. > [!NOTE] > 链接-本地地址，格式前缀 (FP) FE80，由标识节点所使用的同一个链路上的相邻节点进行通信时。Link-local addresses, identified by the Format Prefix (FP) FE80, are used by nodes when communicating with neighboring nodes on the same link. - 站点本地地址。Site-local addresses. 主机可以连接到多个站点。A host can be connected to multiple sites. 在这种情况下，范围标识符用于指示特定站点与进行通信。In this case, a scope identifier is used to indicate a specific site to communicate with. > [!NOTE] > 站点本地地址，格式前缀 (FP) FEC0，由标识节点所使用的专用 intranet 上进行通信时。Site-local addresses, identified by the Format Prefix (FP) FEC0, are used by nodes when communicating on private intranets. 用于指定的表示法`ScopeId`的地址是`Address%ScopeId`。The notation that is used to specify the `ScopeId` with an address is `Address%ScopeId`. 例如，`FE80::5EFE:192.168.41.30%2.`For example, `FE80::5EFE:192.168.41.30%2.` ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/CPP/ipaddress.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/CS/ipaddress.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/VB/ipaddress.vb#3)]

- > 0x00000000FFFFFFFF

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，此方法接受为有效 ipString 值，该值可以解析为，并将该 Int64 然后视为以网络字节顺序，方式类似于 IP 地址的长值的does 构造函数。Note that this method accepts as valid an ipString value that can be parsed as an , and then treats that Int64 as the long value of an IP address in network byte order, similar to the way that the constructor does. 这意味着此方法返回如果 Int64 解析成功，则为 true，即使它表示不是有效的 IP 地址的地址。This means that this method returns true if the Int64 is parsed successfully, even if it represents an address that's not a valid IP address. 例如，如果 ipString"1"，此方法返回 true 即使"1"（或 0.0.0.1） 不是有效的 IP 地址，并且您可能希望此方法返回 false。For example, if ipString is "1", this method returns true even though "1" (or 0.0.0.1) is not a valid IP address and you might expect this method to return false. 修复此 bug 会破坏现有应用程序，因此将不会更改当前行为。Fixing this bug would break existing apps, so the current behavior will not be changed. 你的代码可以通过确保它仅使用此方法来分析采用点分十进制格式的 IP 地址来避免此行为。Your code can avoid this behavior by ensuring that it only uses this method to parse IP addresses in dotted-decimal format.

span.span: is null.
